alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Glades; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:12PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, northwestern Palm Beach and southern Glades Counties through 200 PM EST... At 112 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from J And S Fish Camp to 6 miles east of Moore Haven to Montura. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, Tequesta, South Bay, Canal Point, Lake Harbor, Montura, Belle Glade Camp, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, North County Airport, Devils Garden, Lion Country Safari Park, Okeelanta, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, The Acreage and Loxahatchee NWR. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Glades; Metro Palm Beach County
